alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Johnson County through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardner, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Lenexa, Leawood, Gardner, Spring Hill, Edgerton, Stanley, Clare and Lackmans. This includes Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 203 and 221. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
